controller

Class Control_Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Control_Main

  • public class Control_Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Sigfredo Guzman Control class that handles and communicates between the GUI, Hibernate Utility class, and Model packages

                        java.lang.String contact)
        Passed in details of New Employee and calls the Employee Model method to add new employee to database table employee.

        first - Employee First Name
        last - Employee Last Name
        address - Employee Street Address
        city - Employee City
        state - Employee State
        zip - Employee Zip Code
        phone - Employee Phone Number
        email - Employee Email
        pay - Employee Pay Rate
        contact - Employee Emergency Contact Number
